intro: Psychotria krukovii, commonly known as the Krukovii Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its glossy, dark green leaves and small, white or pale pink flowers that bloom in clusters. It is often found in humid, shaded environments such as rainforests. Psychotria krukovii is also noted for its potential ethnobotanical uses, though further research is needed to fully understand its properties.
